cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: mode in which the data are represented

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: high-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive. NOTE: It is understood there are overlaps between general categories and the user is encouraged to select the one most appropriate.

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: high-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive. NOTE: It is understood there are overlaps between general categories and the user is encouraged to select the one most appropriate.

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants. Examples: agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants. Examples: agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: flora and/or fauna in natural environment. Examples: wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sealife, wetlands, habitat

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: flora and/or fauna in natural environment. Examples: wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sealife, wetlands, habitat

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: legal land descriptions, maritime boundaries. Examples: political and administrative boundaries, territorial seas, EEZ, port security zones

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: legal land descriptions, maritime boundaries. Examples: political and administrative boundaries, territorial seas, EEZ, port security zones

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: processes and phenomena of the atmosphere. Examples: cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: processes and phenomena of the atmosphere. Examples: cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: economic activities, conditions and employment. Examples: production, labour, revenue, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: economic activities, conditions and employment. Examples: production, labour, revenue, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: height above or below a vertical datum. Examples: altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: height above or below a vertical datum. Examples: altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: environmental resources, protection and conservation. Examples: environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: environmental resources, protection and conservation. Examples: environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: information pertaining to earth sciences. Examples: geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth's rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, erosion

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: information pertaining to earth sciences. Examples: geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth's rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, erosion

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: health, health services, human ecology, and safety. Examples: disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: health, health services, human ecology, and safety. Examples: disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: base maps. Examples: land cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: base maps. Examples: land cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: military bases, structures, activities. Examples: barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: military bases, structures, activities. Examples: barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics. Examples: rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods, water quality, hydrologic information

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics. Examples: rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods, water quality, hydrologic information

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: positional information and services. Examples: addresses, geodetic networks, control points, postal zones and services, place names

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: positional information and services. Examples: addresses, geodetic networks, control points, postal zones and services, place names

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters) Examples: tides, tsunamis, coastal information, reefs

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters) Examples: tides, tsunamis, coastal information, reefs

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land. Examples: land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land. Examples: land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: characteristics of society and cultures. Examples: settlements, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, recreational areas and activities, social impact assessments, crime and justice, census information

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: characteristics of society and cultures. Examples: settlements, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, recreational areas and activities, social impact assessments, crime and justice, census information

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: man-made construction. Examples: buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: man-made construction. Examples: buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods. Examples: roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels, nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods. Examples: roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels, nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services. Examples: hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services. Examples: hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: region more than 100 km above the surface of the Earth

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Information related to disasters. Examples: site of the disaster, evacuation zone, disaster-prevention facility, disaster relief activities

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Information related to disasters. Examples: site of the disaster, evacuation zone, disaster-prevention facility, disaster relief activities

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: type of coupling between service and associated data (if exists)

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: type of coupling between service and associated data (if exists)

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: service instance is loosely coupled with a data instance, i.e. no MD_DataIdentification class has to be described

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: service instance is loosely coupled with a data instance, i.e. no MD_DataIdentification class has to be described

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: service instance is mixed coupled with a data instance, i.e. MD_DataIdentification describes the associated data instance and additionally the service instance might work with other external data instances
